verbs.description: [ARG0: soccer] [V: brings] [ARG1: siblings] [ARG3: together] [ARGM-LOC: at new jersey city university sister and brother karen and anthony tuesta] were n't very close growing up due to a 12-year age gap one thing they did share in common was the sport of soccer soccer has brought karen and anthony to become much closer as adults for the past three seasons karen has been a starting midfielder at njcu where anthony has been the program head coach the experience has understandably so gone beyond the typical player - coach relationship while it has always been a professional relationship on the field off it both have become closer than they ever were as children our bond has become a lot closer i never felt so close to my brother as i did over these last three years said karen he been helping me with soccer with school i 'm always at his office we 've created a much bigger bond and you can tell on the field and off the field we are so close we talk about everything anthony said she my younger sister but she also like my best friend we always talk we talk about soccer we talk about life and we talk about my experiences anthony a standout player at clifton high school went anthony tuesta association football new jersey new jersey city university karen njcu soccer
